content: description this scarf is the perfect spring and summer accessory to any wardrobe its construction provides a lightweight and airy feel the pattern includes photos and a step-by-step guide for attaching the tassels skills this is a beginner level crochet pattern and the techniques involved are single_crochet half_double_crochet double_crochet and chaining and skipping stitches all patterns are written in standard us terms sizing not including tassels width 33 inches length 33 inches you may create items made from this pattern but i request that you reference me as the designer please do not use my photos
